query: Could you assist me in designing a 3-day travel plan for 2 people departing from Houston and heading to Atlanta from March 5th to March 7th, 2022? We are planning on a budget of $2,400. Our accommodations must be child-friendly as we will have children under 10 with us, and we require entire rooms. We won't be driving ourselves, so transportation will need to be arranged.
